tool_description: Tells you if it is the apero time and tell you what you should drink (with moderation)
name: aperoTime
title: aperoTime

api_list.name: Apero time
api_list.description:
Return a JSON object that tells you if it is the time for an apero.
It also randomly choose what you should drink or eat.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aperotime.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aperotime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aperotime.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aperotime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
